name: pnp-remove-api-permissions
title: Remove SharePoint API permissions
shortDescription: This script helps you to quickly remove SharePoint API permissions.
longDescription: When building SharePoint Framework solutions connected to APIs secured with Azure Active Directory, you might need to clear the list of granted API permissions. This script helps you to quickly remove SharePoint API permissions.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
